articles.author: Steve Gorman (Reuters)
articles.title: NASA names woman, black astronauts for new mission - The Jakarta Post
articles.description: The United States space agency NASA on Monday named the first woman and the first African American ever assigned as astronauts to a lunar mission, introducing them as part of the four-member team chosen to fly on what would be the first crewed voyage around t…
